meanings.definition: The round of a competition or tournament that precedes the semifinals and follows the round of 16.
meanings.sent1: In the quarterfinal, the teams compete to advance to the next stage of the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The quarterfinal match will determine which team moves on to the next round.
meanings.sent3: During the quarterfinal, the players showed great determination and skill.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the quarterfinal was electric, with fans cheering loudly for their favorite team.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the quarterfinal was palpable as both teams fought for victory.

meanings.definition: A match or game that takes place in this round.
meanings.sent1: The quarterfinal was intense, with both teams giving their all to win.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the quarterfinal to see which team would emerge victorious.
meanings.sent3: The quarterfinal turned into a nail-biting showdown between the top contenders.
meanings.sent4: In the quarterfinal, the underdog team surprised everyone with their exceptional performance.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the quarterfinal left spectators on the edge of their seats.
